tag_list: motion-graphics, user-interface-design, digital-marketing, web-design, photography, video-editing, video-production, post-production, 3d, art-direction, online-advertising, studio-management, project-management, web-application-design, mobile-application-
overview:
Simon comes from a background in Creative, Film, Television & Post Production, specialising in cinematography, editing & motion graphics.

With a proven track record in the startup space as joint founder and Chief Creative Officer of CKSK (cksk.com), Simon has been responsible for the multi-awarding winning visual and interactive quality of every production at CKSK.

Simon’s unerring QA process and focus on quality has driven sustained growth and international recognition for the business’ design, creative flair and technical ingenuity.

Recently established CKSK’s new European office in Amsterdam and assumed position of MD within CKSK Ireland.

Co-founder of Folio (fol.io), Simon’s main focus is on building and leading the creative team through product design & development, overseeing the front end build of Folio, and working closely on future product development.
